list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: take hold of and remove (a flower, fruit, or vegetable) from where it is growing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I went to pick some flowers for Jenny's room
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã đi hái một ít hoa cho phòng của Jenny

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: choose (someone or something) from a number of alternatives, typically after careful thought.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: maybe I picked the wrong career after all
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Có lẽ tôi đã chọn sai sự nghiệp sau tất cả

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make (a hole) in fabric by pulling at it with one's fingers.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she picked a hole in her tights
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô nhặt một cái lỗ trong quần của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pluck the strings of (a guitar or banjo).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: people were singing and picking guitars
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mọi người đang hát và hái guitar

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act or the right of selecting something from among a group of alternatives.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: take your pick from our extensive menu
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hãy chọn từ thực đơn phong phú của chúng tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of blocking or screening a defensive player from the ball handler, allowing an open shot.

a tool consisting of a long handle set at right angles in the middle of a curved iron or steel bar with a point at one end and a chisel edge or point at the other, used for breaking up hard ground or rock.
